channel.title: Ocular #484 - The era that should have been
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AMKAguQ.png[/img]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=7]Introduction[/SIZE]
I've assembled a development unit of 4 people to create a framework of the howling revision 484. This project will basically emulate what Runescape was in that era. Anything that wasn't in that particular era will not implemented into this project. We will be using Netty 3.6 as our networking type because MINA hasn't been updated for 2 years. We intend on making the core our first priority before we attempt entity identification, player and npc updating. We are Ocular #484!
[B]Developers:[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]GoNao (Founder/Server developer) [img]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Barry (Server developer) [img]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Hoodlum (Server/Client developer) [img]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Titanium (Server/Website developer)
[B][I]Features:[/I][/B] [code] [/code]
[B][I]Update Log:[/I][/B] [code] Started Ocular #484 [/code]
[B][I]Media:[/I][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VxZ8I7g.png[/img]
[B][I]Credits:[/I][/B]
Graham Alias [/center]

item.title: Ocular #484 - The era that should have been
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:13, topic:524309”][quote author=Scully link=topic=642850.msg4328884#msg4328884 date=1373384509]

what was special about 484 specifically?

484 is basically 498 without Fist of Guthix, and with only half of the summoning familiars.
[/quote]they only did half of the summoning familiars at first? I didn’t know that :o was there a specific interface before the one for all of them?[/quote]

The interfaces were exactly the same, but they said “Coming Soon.” instead of showing what the familiar was.

Read full topic

item.title: Ocular #484 - The era that should have been
item.dc:creator: @GoNao GoNao
item.description:
@GoNao wrote:

Loveandpower:

what was special about 484 specifically?

In my opinion I think it was runescape’s prime during the 484 revision.

Angel Carlos:

gl so is this basically a remake?..

Somewhat of a remake but not all.

Thanks for the support guys.

Read full topic
